safetyTips: Contactless online payment by card only. "Knock" & drop delivery
name: SOLLEY'S ICE CREAM
address: Solley's Ice Cream Parlour, The Dairy, Church Lane, Deal, CT14 8JL
description: Solley's Ice Cream delivers to the Ashford area on a Friday.  Minimum order 2 x 750ml tubs or 1 x box 120ml cups with free delivery.  The full list of flavours & prices can be found on our website and is updated weekly. Order via email only.
